replies.body: The 10 ban system was required, but the method of 10 banning is just stupid. So essentially both teams would be trying to ban what they think are the 5 most op champ, essentially going from a 6 ban system to 5 bans, as duplicates are allowed. Theres no way to counterplay, someone could ban their champs counters and pick their preferred champ, gg...

Just a note that the items on the website have not been updated. 

Clicked on Banshees Veil and it still shows the old banshees veil stats.

http://gameinfo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/items/
{{item:3187}}
Yeah, I don't think the items or champs on the official website is being updated anymore. Better to go to Wikia for that stuff.
True, but it would be nice when they provide a link on their official website that if you click on it, it provides correct information not outdated stuff.
pretty sure they still have the old galio image or even possible whole old galio up there

Plz stahp reducing the number of bans....

"You get 10 bans!

_Unless_... you pick the same bans as the other team....

and.. unless someone decides not to ban altogether...."

Plz. 10 bans. no more. no less.

Oh joy, Xayah & Rakan Warding VO as if relantionship goals aint enough, next thing would be PDAs... might as well add fanservice while your at it
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
The new ban system is dumb. It's not really 10 bans. And it serves no strategic purpose if you can't see what the other team is banning. The dumbing down has begun
i just versed the new reksai and when she ults is she meant to go invisible because that seems pretty weird
The new rek'sai burrows underground and jumps into the air making her untargetable which is an intended feature,
can u fix ahri charm?????? when you charm the enemy champ they don't even walk towards you. :L???{{champion:103}} {{item:3070}}

Rek'sai has been ruined her cc is worse, jungle sustain worse and most of all an ult that can be dodged simply by walking towards it. sure it might not be so bad if she didnt scream first alerting enemies its time to walk slowly to dodge or use any movement abilities or flash or just stand there because at lv 1 it does almost no dmg to a champion on 10% health.

Something notable that was changed that you left off the notes, the first win of the timer once again shows more then hours. It was really bad how it showed 1h remaining even with only 10s left on the timer...

Love the inclusion of the unique item sets in the new client.

Looking forward to the new 10 ban system but what made you chose to do it the way it is as opposed to the old style? Just quicker que times?
Looks good so far, only thing i want to change is the Ranked lockdowns on oce, i dont care if i have to wait for a 15 min queue just aslong as i can play.
